tab1.text1: <TextStyle.Yellow>If you notice a problem, something is out of balance or if you have some wishes, please let us know!</>

tab2.text1:
You find the <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Shop</> related stuff in your <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Inventory</> in the <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">bottom left corner</>

- <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Starter kits</> available
- You gain <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">100 Gold every 15 min</>

- We add more stuff from time to time

- If you wish something special or have some ideas, please let us know!
tab2.text3: - <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Currently there is one Quest available</>

tab3.text1:
- We are currently working on the fine-tuning for pvp
- We create items/kits for new players and integrate them into an ingame store system
- We are working on a server trailer and server advertising
tab3.text2:
- <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Crossmaps</> in the PvP area (starting with Scortch Earth)
- If wished also in the PvE area
- <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Our focus</> is on 2 Man & 4 Man PvP Server
- A fair INGAME <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">store system</> to better integrate new or <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">wiped players</> into the game.
- <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Events</> (if there are enough players)
- PvP Season with videos for the community
- Trailer videos of the server maps
- Discord development
- Create your own community mod

tab4.text1:
- <TextStyle.Orange>Wipe on first every month</>

- 10x EXP
- 10x Farming
- 10x Taming (5x with 2x eat)
- 40x Maturation | 20x Hatching
- 15x Item stack | RawPrimeMeat up to 5
- 25x Weight for Player/Dino
- 2 man Tribe + 1 Alliance
- Maximum wild dino level 150
- Maximum player level 105
- Enough points for all Engrams
- No movement speed leveling (swim speed scales 2x with oxygen)
- Cave building allowed (6x structure damage in caves)
- Turrets in range place limit 150
- 30 sec PVP respawn cooldown (not stacking) for YEET actions
- Force wild dino respawn on server restart is enabled
tab4.text2:
Check out our other servers:

<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">PVP</>
- RTR [EU] -PVP- x10 | 4Man | Mods | >1<

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">PVE</>
- RTR [EU] -PVE- x5x | Shop | NoWipe | >3<
tab4.text3:
Server restart <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">every day 6 AM</>

- After restart the server might be laggy for 5 min, caused by forced wild dino respawn!

tab5.text1:
#1 - If you notice lagging/rubberband after join

#2 - Bug
tab5.text2:
#1 - You have to die or travel between beds
